definition: to hack/to chop/to split open/(of lightning) to strike
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: So it's centered at this frequency that was expected, but it's actually split into two different frequencies.
sentences.chinese: 它的中心在预计频率处，但劈裂成两个不同频率。

sentences.english: All of these belong to the problems of hydraulic fracturing.
sentences.chinese: 这些都属于水力劈裂问题。

sentences.english: Discussed initially the mechanism of polycarboxylic water-reducer improve performance of cracking-resistance of concrete.
sentences.chinese: 初步探讨了聚羧酸减水剂提高混凝土抗劈裂性能机理。

sentences.english: Steel floral tube fracturing grouting technology is adopted in slop reinforcement of Shenzhen Buji eastern and western main-road.
sentences.chinese: 深圳布吉东西干道边坡采用钢花管劈裂注浆技术加固。

sentences.english: The effect of various annealing systems on the splitting of cold-drawn steel rod is very little.
sentences.chinese: 各种退火制度对冷拉钢脆性劈裂的影响较小。

sentences.english: We could hear the old Chinese scholartree riving and splitting under thundering and lightning.
sentences.chinese: 我们能听见古槐在雷鸣闪电中被劈裂的声音。

sentences.english: Theoretical analysis was employed to analyze the fracturing phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 理论分析则解释了土体的劈裂现象。

sentences.english: Increases the damage of Bash and Cleave.
sentences.chinese: 增加重击和劈裂的伤害。

sentences.english: The sound of splintering wood reverberated outside.
sentences.chinese: 外面，回响着木门被劈裂的声音。

definition: to rupture/to burst open/to break up
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend
to split open/to dehisce (of fruit or cotton bolls, to split open)
to cleave/to split open/to spread open (fingers, legs)
talus slide/to crumble (of scree slope)/to collapse/landslide
at the base/at the root/(of a leg) just below the crutch
